title: Minors in Actuarial Studies offered by FOMC
content: Does anybody know how this will be useful? Internship/placement wise? What is FOMC?

comments.body:
As the title explains it's just a minor subject you can pick up if your interested, in the email ig it is explained that its 4 credits each subject.The subjects are actural mathematics,actural statistics,risk modeling, business finance, business economics,business management.
Comming to if it's helpful in internships etc, It is a little bit helpful but not sure how much they consider it, FOMC is just an abbreviation of faculty of management and commerce.
